titles: Articles to be enquired of vvithin the diocesse of London In the third trienniall visitation of the Right Honourable, and Right Reverend Father in God, William, Lord Bishop of London, Lord High Treasurer of England. Holden in the yeare of our Lord God, 1640
author: Church of England. Diocese of London. Bishop (1633-1660 : Juxon)

notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
